channel.title: Smtp on Dash
channel.description: Recent content in Smtp on Dash

item.title: SMTP Problem Solving
item.description: Recently I’ve set up a ticket system, OTRS, which uses smtp for sending out email. It works well in my virtual machine, and in my own server. But when deploying it onto the lab PC, it cannot send out email via smtp. Following is the solving procedure for this problem. SMTP Server When Login into the server, following is how to using smtp for sending out email. $ telnet localhost 25 Trying 127.
